profile.name: Kaique Feng
profile.bio: I am a crazy developer and love create new projects and testing new technologies, my principal tech stack is React Js, Next Js, typeScript and your ecosystem. I have experience in the front-end area for over 9 years and have worked in several market niches.
profile.footer: No cookies, no trackers, just links.
